title: JD Vance says he's not hurt by 'weird' campaign: 'If you can't take the heat...'
content: ​“Look, the price of admission — meaning, the price of getting to serve the people of this country — is the Democrats are going to attack us with everything that they have. I think it’s an honor,” Vance said citing Harry Truman that "if you can't take the heat, stay out of the kitchen".
summary: ​“Look, the price of admission — meaning, the price of getting to serve the people of this country — is the Democrats are going to attack us with everything that they have. I think it’s an honor,” Vance said citing Harry Truman that "if you can't take the heat, stay out of the kitchen".

title: Shooter at Trump rally identified as suspicious one hour prior to incident: FBI
content: Police identified Thomas Crooks, the 20-year-old man attempting to assassinate Donald Trump, over an hour before the July 13 shooting at a rally, according to statement by FBI. Although Crooks was flagged as suspicious and photographed, he still managed to carry out the attack, which left Trump injured. The FBI is investigating the sequence of events, while Crooks' motive remains unclear.
summary: Police identified Thomas Crooks, the 20-year-old man attempting to assassinate Donald Trump, over an hour before the July 13 shooting at a rally, according to statement by FBI. Although Crooks was flagged as suspicious and photographed, he still managed to carry out the attack, which left Trump injured. The FBI is investigating the sequence of events, while Crooks' motive remains unclear.

title: Silly, not even a philanthropist: Melinda French slams Elon Musk
content: Melinda French who parted ways with Bill Gates and the Foundation that she helped build has been at the receiving end for her endorsement of former Democratic candidate President Joe Biden. With a change in the candidate, Melinda now openly endorses vice president Kamal Harris and makes no bones about it. In an interview with the New York Times, she said she does not sit on the fence and always made it clear in which camp she is in.
summary: Melinda French who parted ways with Bill Gates and the Foundation that she helped build has been at the receiving end for her endorsement of former Democratic candidate President Joe Biden. With a change in the candidate, Melinda now openly endorses vice president Kamal Harris and makes no bones about it. In an interview with the New York Times, she said she does not sit on the fence and always made it clear in which camp she is in.

title: One died, 6 injured in mass shooting in New York
content: A mass shooting in Rochester's Maplewood Park resulted in one death and six injuries. Authorities responded promptly at 6:20 p.m. and found several gunshot victims. The deceased, an adult in their 20s, has yet to be publicly identified. Law enforcement agencies are investigating and seeking video evidence or any information from witnesses. No suspects have been arrested so far.
summary: A mass shooting in Rochester's Maplewood Park resulted in one death and six injuries. Authorities responded promptly at 6:20 p.m. and found several gunshot victims. The deceased, an adult in their 20s, has yet to be publicly identified. Law enforcement agencies are investigating and seeking video evidence or any information from witnesses. No suspects have been arrested so far.

title: John Oliver says he can easily believe Vance had sex with couch: '10 out of 10'
content: The US election dominated John Oliver's Last week Tonight as Oliver dwelled a lot on the rumors involving JD Vance and sex with couch. He said he can totally believe in the rumor because if he's asked to draw a man who f***s his couch, John Oliver will draw JD Vance -- 10 times out of 10. The same might have happened to all those who believed in the rumor and spread it, Oliver presented his hilarious take on the issue.
summary: The US election dominated John Oliver's Last week Tonight as Oliver dwelled a lot on the rumors involving JD Vance and sex with couch. He said he can totally believe in the rumor because if he's asked to draw a man who f***s his couch, John Oliver will draw JD Vance -- 10 times out of 10. The same might have happened to all those who believed in the rumor and spread it, Oliver presented his hilarious take on the issue.

title: Why 'childless cat ladies' worry JD Vance: 'Lower birth rate = less patriotism'
content: ​​JD Vance thinks young Americans are growing up more socially isolated. They are not dating as much as they used to and they are spending less time socially resulting is less marriage and much thinner friendship groups. Vance, the report claimed, said lower fertility might also be the result of less patriotism.
summary: ​​JD Vance thinks young Americans are growing up more socially isolated. They are not dating as much as they used to and they are spending less time socially resulting is less marriage and much thinner friendship groups. Vance, the report claimed, said lower fertility might also be the result of less patriotism.

title: 'Battlefield is not solution to Russia-Ukraine conflict': Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar emphasized that the solution to the Russia-Ukraine conflict lies in dialogue and diplomacy, not on the battlefield. Speaking in Tokyo, he highlighted the extensive human and economic toll, advocating for more active countries to engage both Russia and Ukraine in conversation, citing successful efforts like Turkey's grain deal restoration and prison exchanges.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar emphasized that the solution to the Russia-Ukraine conflict lies in dialogue and diplomacy, not on the battlefield. Speaking in Tokyo, he highlighted the extensive human and economic toll, advocating for more active countries to engage both Russia and Ukraine in conversation, citing successful efforts like Turkey's grain deal restoration and prison exchanges.

title: Kamala Harris' message on Venezuela election slammed on X: 'Shameful'
content: Vice President Kamala Harris was slammed on X after she posted a message saying that the will of the Venezuelan people must be respected as the opposition had been claiming irregularities after incumbent president Nicholas Maduro was declared the winner. US expressed concerns that the result does not reflect the will of the Venezuelans but Kamala Harris in her post made hours earlier said 'the will of the Venezuelan people must be respected'.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris was slammed on X after she posted a message saying that the will of the Venezuelan people must be respected as the opposition had been claiming irregularities after incumbent president Nicholas Maduro was declared the winner. US expressed concerns that the result does not reflect the will of the Venezuelans but Kamala Harris in her post made hours earlier said 'the will of the Venezuelan people must be respected'.

title: Musk see in US elections: Google and the X factor
'Latest fakes': Russia rejects western media speculation over Moscow's involvement in France railway attack
content: The Kremlin dismissed media claims about Russian involvement in recent French railway sabotage. Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov termed the accusations as 'fake'. French interior minister suspects far-left groups behind the attack. An activist connected to an ultra-left movement was arrested in northern France. The incident caused disruption shortly before the Paris Olympics opening ceremony.
summary: The Kremlin dismissed media claims about Russian involvement in recent French railway sabotage. Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov termed the accusations as 'fake'. French interior minister suspects far-left groups behind the attack. An activist connected to an ultra-left movement was arrested in northern France. The incident caused disruption shortly before the Paris Olympics opening ceremony.

title: 'No one is above law': Biden unveils plan to reform Supreme Court
content: President Joe Biden proposed a constitutional amendment to reform the Supreme Court, aiming for term limits and an enforceable ethics code. Frustrated with Trump-appointed judges, Biden sought to overturn a decision on presidential immunity. Despite slim chances of passing through Congress, the initiative aimed to highlight the Supreme Court's controversial rulings and growing public discontent.
summary: President Joe Biden proposed a constitutional amendment to reform the Supreme Court, aiming for term limits and an enforceable ethics code. Frustrated with Trump-appointed judges, Biden sought to overturn a decision on presidential immunity. Despite slim chances of passing through Congress, the initiative aimed to highlight the Supreme Court's controversial rulings and growing public discontent.

title: Stopped drone barrage on its soil while pushing for breakthrough in Ukraine: Russia
content: Russian air defenses intercepted 39 Ukrainian drones across five regions, including Leningrad, damaging infrastructure. Ukrainian forces faced intensified Russian attacks in eastern Ukraine, particularly around Pokrovsk. President Zelenskyy described the situation in Donetsk as extremely challenging, highlighting Russia's strategy of attritional warfare and incremental gains.
summary: Russian air defenses intercepted 39 Ukrainian drones across five regions, including Leningrad, damaging infrastructure. Ukrainian forces faced intensified Russian attacks in eastern Ukraine, particularly around Pokrovsk. President Zelenskyy described the situation in Donetsk as extremely challenging, highlighting Russia's strategy of attritional warfare and incremental gains.

title: Italy's Meloni meets China's Xi to 'relaunch' ties
content: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, pledging to improve relations after Italy's exit from the Belt and Road Initiative. Meloni emphasized fair and balanced trade. Talks with Premier Li Qiang aimed at stabilizing bilateral cooperation, marking her administration's effort to strengthen ties with China's significant trading partner status.
summary: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni met Chinese leader Xi Jinping in Beijing, pledging to improve relations after Italy's exit from the Belt and Road Initiative. Meloni emphasized fair and balanced trade. Talks with Premier Li Qiang aimed at stabilizing bilateral cooperation, marking her administration's effort to strengthen ties with China's significant trading partner status.

title: Watch: Dragonflies swarm busy island beach in US
Quad foreign ministers decry dangerous South China Sea actions
content: Foreign ministers from Australia, India, Japan, and the U.S. expressed serious concern over dangerous manoeuvres in the South China Sea after their Quad meeting in Tokyo. They discussed enhancing maritime security in the region and reiterated their strong opposition to unilateral actions. Initiatives to maintain a free and open Indo-Pacific were also highlighted during the talks.
summary: Foreign ministers from Australia, India, Japan, and the U.S. expressed serious concern over dangerous manoeuvres in the South China Sea after their Quad meeting in Tokyo. They discussed enhancing maritime security in the region and reiterated their strong opposition to unilateral actions. Initiatives to maintain a free and open Indo-Pacific were also highlighted during the talks.

title: Body of missing worker found 3 days after roof collapse at Phoenix warehouse
Lebanon FM says diplomatic efforts ongoing to rein in awaited Israeli retaliation
content: Lebanon's top diplomat revealed that multiple countries are engaging in diplomacy to prevent an escalation after an attack blamed on Hezbollah killed civilians in Golan Heights. Israeli defence minister Yoav Gallant vowed a strong response. Hezbollah denied involvement, while international efforts focus on de-escalation. The violence since October has caused significant casualties on both sides.
summary: Lebanon's top diplomat revealed that multiple countries are engaging in diplomacy to prevent an escalation after an attack blamed on Hezbollah killed civilians in Golan Heights. Israeli defence minister Yoav Gallant vowed a strong response. Hezbollah denied involvement, while international efforts focus on de-escalation. The violence since October has caused significant casualties on both sides.

title: 6 UK lawmakers are running to lead Conservative Party after its crushing election defeat
content: Six British lawmakers announced their candidacy for Conservative Party leadership after the recent election loss. Contenders include James Cleverly and Tom Tugendhat from the centrist faction, and Priti Patel and Kemi Badenoch from the right wing. Former Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will remain acting leader until a new leader is chosen on Nov. 2.
summary: Six British lawmakers announced their candidacy for Conservative Party leadership after the recent election loss. Contenders include James Cleverly and Tom Tugendhat from the centrist faction, and Priti Patel and Kemi Badenoch from the right wing. Former Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will remain acting leader until a new leader is chosen on Nov. 2.
